name: Trazodone Hydrochloride

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: Trazodone is a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) (1).
contraindications: Starting dose: 150 mg in      divided doses daily. May be increased by 50 mg per day every three to four      days. Maximum dose: 400 mg per day in divided doses (2.1). Trazodone hydrochloride tablets      should be taken shortly after a meal or light snack (2.2). Tablets should be swallowed      whole or broken in half along the score line (2.2). When discontinued, gradual dose      reduction is recommended (2.6).
warningsAndPrecautions:
Trazodone Hydrochloride Tablets USP, 100 mg are white to off-white, round-shape, biconvex beveled tablets, bisect on one side and plain on other side. The bisected side of tablet is debossed with '8' on upper side of bisect and '06' on lower side of bisect and are supplied as follows:
                  
                  NDCs
                  60760-806-60 BOTTLES OF 60
                  60760-806-90 BOTTLES OF 90
                  
                  60760-806-30 BOTTLES OF 30 - INACTIVE
                  
                  
                  
                  Store at 20째 to 25째C (68째 to 77째F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  Dispense with a child-resistant closure in a tight, light-resistant container.
adverseReactions: None ( 4 ). Concomitant use of monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs), or use within 14 days of stopping MAOIs (4).
